about.details:
Incorporated in 1997, Shardha Infraprojects (Nagpur) Private Limited is a Nagpur based real estate development company, engaged in the business of development and sale of residential as well as commercial properties and the development and leasing of commercial properties. Company is primarily operating in Nagpur focused on premium developments with presence in residential, Commercial and hospitality in mixed-use and single-segment developments.

Shardha Infra is primarily engaged in 2 business segments:

1. Development Business

The Development Business includes activities related to residential real estate development, from the identification and acquisition of land through to the planning, execution and sales of the development projects. The residential properties include plotted developments, houses and apartments of varying sizes. The Development Business also consists of the development and sale of certain commercial properties.

2. Lease Business

The Lease Business involves leasing of the commercial properties. The commercial properties include corporate offices and educational institutions.

contactDetails.full_address: Shradha Infraprojects (Nagpur) Limited, Shradha House, Near Shri Mohini Complex Kingsway, Block No. F/8

faqs.question: What is the Shradha Infra IPO?
faqs.answer:
Shradha Infra IPO is a SME IPO of 2704000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹18.93 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹70 per share. The minimum order quantity is .

The IPO opens on November 27, 2017, and closes on November 30, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Shradha Infra IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Shradha Infra IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Shradha Infra IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Shradha Infra IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Shradha Infra IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Shradha Infra IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Shradha Infra IPO opens on November 27, 2017 and closes on November 30, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Shradha Infra IPO?
faqs.answer: Shradha Infra IPO lot size and the minimum order quantity is not available at this time. Please check again later.

faqs.question: How to apply for Shradha Infra IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Shradha Infra IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
